ygData.subject: 1HS Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail fellow bards! I think about buying my first magical weapon right now and wanted to know what kind of 1HS combine weapons do exist in the game. I ve just
ygData.messageBody:
Hail fellow bards!

I think about buying my first magical weapon right now and wanted to know
what kind of 1HS combine weapons do exist in the game. I've just heard about
a combine longsword which you can buy at the gipsy camps. Are there other
combine weapons, maybe with better stats than the longsword? I just dont
wanna pay all my money for a combine longsword just to hear 1 day later that
there would be a much better combine bastardsword to buy for just 10pp more...

Thanks for your help.

Athelas
Tarew Marr


---
Sent through Global Message Exchange - http://www.gmx.net
